item.title: Trump Officials Warn of Tariff Pain as Price Increases Loom and Stocks Tumble
item.description: The president’s aides insist the fallout will be short and ultimately result in a better economy, as economists warn of higher inflation and slower gr...

item.title: Trump’s Trade War Escalates as China Retaliates With 34% Tariffs
item.description: The Chinese government said it would match President Trump’s tariff, and also barred a group of American companies from doing business in China.

item.title: Europe’s Paradox
item.description: We explain a development that may help the far right in Europe.

item.title: Gen. Timothy Haugh Ousted as Head of NSA and Cyber Command
item.description: No reason was given for the removal of Gen. Timothy D. Haugh. The far-right activist Laura Loomer had called for his ouster in a meeting with Presiden...

item.title: Invasion of the Home Humanoid Robots
item.description: Dozens of companies are building robots that look like humans. One of them is training a machine to be a butler and will soon test them in homes.
